Text:
Hi malestrom_HH,
I very much appreciate your torrents. It could not be done without you. So we ask you anything we need.
One request, Could you please upload the "Sight & Sound", the monthly film magazine published by bfi( http://www.bfi.org.uk/sightandsound ) for us? It would be a great help for the film lovers worldwide.
Thank you

Shamik
INDIA

Mr. Malestrom,

Could you please include include in your uploads the GQ magazines and Men's Vogue magazines?  I would appreciate it very much.  Thank you!
